text: Mariupol (, ; ; also ;Collection of laws and orders of the Workers-Peasants Government of Ukraine . "Radianske Budivnytstvo i Pravo". State archives. February 29, 1932 ; ) is a city in south eastern Ukraine, on the north coast of the Sea of Azov. It is the tenth-largest city in Ukraine,List of cities in Ukraine – List of cities in Ukraine and the second largest in the Donetsk Oblast.Ukrcensus.org.ua – All-Ukrainian population census '2001 About 450.000 people live there. ==Related pages== *Warfare in southern Ukraine during the Russo-Ukrainian War ==References== Category:Cities in Donetsk Oblast
title: Mariupol
